title: Schuylkill River Valley National Heritage Area: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       The yearly Schuylkill River Sojourn, a 7 day canoe or kayak trip down the river occurs the first week of June. Visit the Heritage Areaâ€™s official webpage for information about the Schuylkill River Sojourn and a schedule of events held by the many partners and sites in the Heritage Area.
